Description: 2015 John Page Classic Ashburn with Bloodline pickups, alder body finished in factory metallic black, maple neck. This is a low serial number guitar (345) and is in excellent shape with almost no wear. The bridge pieces were replaced with Gotoh modern bridge saddles so a screw is not digging into your hand. The fret edges were also worked on so the the neck is ultra smooth with no sharp fret edges. This guitar stays in tune and sounds amazing. With all original case stuff, factory gig bag. Will ship in well-packed John Page cardboard case designed for this guitar. Honestly, you will love this guitar. John Page reverse angled the bridge pickup to get a more "Hendrix" type of sound and it sounds great. I am selling to thin the herd so to speak as I already have too many guitars. You will not be disappointed with this one. Lower 48 US states shipping/sales only. UPS ground shipping. John Page says: The Ashburn perfectly embodies the Uniquely Familiar™ custom design aesthetic developed by John Page over his 40-year body of work. A double-cutaway, solid body guitar custom designed by John Page to embody his Uniquely Familiar™ design aesthetic. Featuring an extremely comfortable medium “C” shaped grip, threaded bolt neck assembly for greater tone transfer, contoured heel for easier upper fret access, staggered tuners that eliminate the need for string trees, bass justified fret dots for greater visibility, and Bloodline® by John Page JP-1 single coil S-style pickups with contrarian bridge pickup slant. Body: AlderNeck: MapleNeck/Body Attachment: Machine screws with Threaded InsertsFingerboard: MapleNeck Shape: Medium CNeck Thickness: 1st: .82" / 12th: .90”Nut Width: 1.68"Fretboard Radius: 12”Scale Length: 25.5"Frets: 22 Nickel Silver (.095’W X .045”H)Hardware: Nickel/ChromeTuners: Gotoh Staggered Vintage StyleBridge: Gotoh 510 TremoloPickups: Bloodline® by John Page™ JP-1 Pickups (3)Pickguard: Parchment (Standard)Controls: Master volume & tone, 5-way pickup selector, noise cancelling in positions 2 and 4Strings: D’Addario EXL110 .010-.046Color: Black Metallic Original MSRP: $1,499 Includes: Gig Bag Embroidered With John Page Classic Logo
Title: John Page Classic Ashburn Bloodline SSS Electric Guitar
